revised_title: Ariel 5 Hard X-Ray Measurements of Galactic and Extragalactic X-Ray Sources
tldr: The authors present a review of the hard X-ray measurements obtained from the Ariel 5 satellite, focusing on the detection and analysis of galactic and extragalactic X-ray sources. They discuss the detector configuration, radioactivity corrections, and the implications of their findings on source models and the understanding of X-ray astronomy.
